channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - gimp

item.title: Today was a productive day
item.description: Fixed 14 bugs today, with a few more pending (those for packages only get marked as FIXED if it is moved to the stable state). One of the changes is the GRUB2 support in the Gentoo Handbook (yes, finally, sorry about that). That opens up the road for the stabilization …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: My application base: geekie
item.description: In the past, when I had to manage my images (pictures) I used GQview (which started back in 2008). But the application doesn't get many updates, and if an application does not get many updates, it either means it is no longer maintained or that it does its job perfectly …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
